name: NSFileProviderManager.DomainRemovalMode
desc: A mode indicating how the system handles user data when removing a domain.

items.name: case removeAll
items.desc: Deletes all items in the domain.

items.name: case preserveDirtyUserData
items.desc: Deletes the domain but keeps any items with unsynced, local changes.

items.name: case preserveDownloadedUserData
items.desc: Deletes the domain, but keeps the downloaded user data.
